### The Importance of Sleep

Before diving into the comparisons, it is crucial to understand why sleep is significant. Quality sleep impacts physical health, mental well-being, and overall quality of life. Lack of sleep can lead to a variety of health issues, including obesity, heart disease, and depression. Thus, creating an optimal sleep environment is essential.
